languages.text: "Я говорила тебе, Муаран... даже мон-кай распознали угрозу, что скрывают тени Лилэтан! Почему ты столь упорствуешь в своей ненависти к мон-кай, когда наш древнейший враг поднял голову?"

traits.locale_text: "Я говорила тебе, Муаран... даже мон-кай распознали угрозу, что скрывают тени Лилэтан! Почему ты столь упорствуешь в своей ненависти к мон-кай, когда наш древнейший враг поднял голову?"

languages.text: "As I have told you, Muaran... even the mon-keigh recognise the threat that has veiled the Lilaethan in shadow! Why are you so insistent on hating the mon-keigh when our most ancient foe has raised its head?"
languages.original_text: "Я говорила тебе, Муаран... даже мон-кай распознали угрозу, что скрывают тени Лилэтан! Почему ты столь упорствуешь в своей ненависти к мон-кай, когда наш древнейший враг поднял голову?"

traits.locale_text: "As I have told you, Muaran... even the mon-keigh recognize the threat that has veiled the Lilaethan in shadow! Why are you so insistent on hating the mon-keigh when our most ancient foe has raised its head?"

"As I have told you, Muaran... even the mon-keigh recognize the threat that has veiled the Lilaethan in shadow! Why are you so insistent on hating the mon-keigh when our most ancient foe has raised its head?"

"As I have told you, Muaran... even the mon-keigh recognize the threat that has veiled the Lilaethan in shadow! Why are you so insistent on hating the mon-keigh when our most ancient foe has raised its head?"

"As I have told you, Muaran... even the mon-keigh recognise the threat that has veiled the Lilaethan in shadow! Why are you so insistent on hating the mon-keigh when our most ancient foe has raised its head?"

languages.text: “就像我和你说过的那样，穆兰……甚至连猴子都意识到了莉莱赞正在面对的威胁！我们最古老的敌人即将崛起，可你为什么还要这么坚持憎恨猴子？”
languages.original_text: "As I have told you, Muaran... even the mon-keigh recognise the threat that has veiled the Lilaethan in shadow! Why are you so insistent on hating the mon-keigh when our most ancient foe has raised its head?"

traits.locale_text: “就像我和你说过的那样，穆兰……甚至连猴子都意识到了莉莱赞正在面对的威胁！我们最古老的敌人即将崛起，可你为什么还要这么坚持憎恨猴子？”

languages.text: 「伝えたとおりだ、ムアラン…このモン＝ケイは、リラエタンを光の届かない影で覆う脅威に気づいている！そこまでモン＝ケイを嫌悪するのはなぜだ？最古の宿敵が顔を上げているというのに」
languages.original_text: "As I have told you, Muaran... even the mon-keigh recognise the threat that has veiled the Lilaethan in shadow! Why are you so insistent on hating the mon-keigh when our most ancient foe has raised its head?"

traits.locale_text: 「伝えたとおりだ、ムアラン…このモン＝ケイは、リラエタンを光の届かない影で覆う脅威に気づいている！そこまでモン＝ケイを嫌悪するのはなぜだ？最古の宿敵が顔を上げているというのに」

languages.text: "Wie ich Euch gesagt habe, Muaran ... selbst die Chem-Pan-Sey nehmen die Bedrohung wahr, die einen Schattenschleier über Lileath gelegt hat! Warum seid Ihr so versessen darauf, die Chem-Pan-Sey zu hassen, obwohl unsere älteste Feindin ihren Kopf erhoben hat?"
languages.original_text: "As I have told you, Muaran... even the mon-keigh recognise the threat that has veiled the Lilaethan in shadow! Why are you so insistent on hating the mon-keigh when our most ancient foe has raised its head?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich Euch gesagt habe, Muaran ... selbst die Chem-Pan-Sey nehmen die Bedrohung wahr, die einen Schattenschleier über Lileath gelegt hat! Warum seid Ihr so versessen darauf, die Chem-Pan-Sey zu hassen, obwohl unsere älteste Feindin ihren Kopf erhoben hat?"

languages.text: « Comme je vous l'ai dit, Muaran... même les mon-keigh sont conscients de la menace qui plonge la lilaethan dans l'ombre ! Pourquoi persistez-vous à les haïr alors que notre plus ancienne ennemie s'est manifestée ? »
languages.original_text: "As I have told you, Muaran... even the mon-keigh recognise the threat that has veiled the Lilaethan in shadow! Why are you so insistent on hating the mon-keigh when our most ancient foe has raised its head?"

traits.locale_text: « Comme je vous l'ai dit, Muaran... même les mon-keigh sont conscients de la menace qui plonge la lilaethan dans l'ombre ! Pourquoi persistez-vous à les haïr alors que notre plus ancienne ennemie s'est manifestée ? »

languages.text: «Como ya he dicho, Muaran... ¡incluso los mon-keigh reconocen la amenaza que ensombrece el Lilaethan! ¿Por qué insistes en repudiar a los mon-keigh cuando nuestro enemigo más antiguo está a la vista?».
languages.original_text: "As I have told you, Muaran... even the mon-keigh recognise the threat that has veiled the Lilaethan in shadow! Why are you so insistent on hating the mon-keigh when our most ancient foe has raised its head?"

traits.locale_text: «Como ya he dicho, Muaran... ¡incluso los mon-keigh reconocen la amenaza que ensombrece el Lilaethan! ¿Por qué insistes en repudiar a los mon-keigh cuando nuestro enemigo más antiguo está a la vista?».

languages.text: "Sana dedim ya Muaran... Mon-keighler bile Lilaethan'ı gizliden gizliye saran tehlikenin farkında! En kadim düşmanımız başımıza musallat olmuşken mon-keighlere duyduğun bu inatçı nefret niye?"
languages.original_text: "As I have told you, Muaran... even the mon-keigh recognise the threat that has veiled the Lilaethan in shadow! Why are you so insistent on hating the mon-keigh when our most ancient foe has raised its head?"

traits.locale_text: "Sana dedim ya Muaran... Mon-keighler bile Lilaethan'ı gizliden gizliye saran tehlikenin farkında! En kadim düşmanımız başımıza musallat olmuşken mon-keighlere duyduğun bu inatçı nefret niye?"
